member.name: ACTIVATION_CONTEXT_DETAILED_INFORMATION
member.summary: TheACTIVATION_CONTEXT_DETAILED_INFORMATION structure is used by the function.

member.name: ACTIVATION_CONTEXT_DETAILED_INFORMATION.ulFormatVersion
member.summary: This value specifies the format of the returned information. On WindowsÂ XP and WindowsÂ Server 2003 this member is always 1.

member.name: ACTIVATION_CONTEXT_DETAILED_INFORMATION.ulAssemblyCount
member.summary: Number of assemblies in the activation context.

summary.para: Specifies the kind of path from which this assembly's manifest was loaded.
This member is always one of the following constants:

member.name: ACTIVATION_CONTEXT_DETAILED_INFORMATION.ulRootManifestPathChars
member.summary: Number of characters in the manifest path.

summary.para: Specifies the kind of path from which this assembly's application configuration manifest was loaded.
This member is always one of the following constants:

member.name: ACTIVATION_CONTEXT_DETAILED_INFORMATION.ulRootConfigurationPathChars
member.summary: Number of characters in any application configuration file path.

summary.para: Specifies the kind of path from which this application manifest was loaded.
This member is always one of the following constants:

member.name: ACTIVATION_CONTEXT_DETAILED_INFORMATION.ulAppDirPathChars
member.summary: Number of characters in the application directory.
